original_text: When the dove returned to him in the evening, there in its beak was a freshly plucked olive leaf! Then Noah knew that the water had receded from the earth.
korean_text: 저녁때에 비둘기가 그에게로 돌아왔는데 그 입에 감람나무 새 잎사귀가 있는지라 이에 노아가 땅에 물이 줄어든 줄을 알았으며

sentences.original_text: When the dove returned to him in the evening
there in its beak was a freshly plucked olive leaf
sentences.korean_translation: 그 부리에는 방금 딴 올리브 잎이 있었다

sentences.original_text: that the water had receded from the earth
